type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.cache.ResolutionRules
type.description: * Represents a set of rules/actions that can be applied during dependency resolution. * Currently these are restricted to controlling caching, but these could possibly be extended in the future to include other manipulations.

method.name: eachArtifact
method.description: * Apply a rule to control resolution of artifacts. * @param rule the rule to apply

method.name: eachDependency
method.description: * Apply a rule to control resolution of dependencies. * @param rule the rule to apply

method.name: eachModule
method.description: * Apply a rule to control resolution of modules. * @param rule the rule to apply
